name: Extreme Car Driving in City
description:
Drive your sports car through traffic and enjoy the fast paced, thrilling arcade racing game. Become a best racer and drive through traffic at crazy speeds. Earn points and buy new faster cars.

****GAME FEATURES****
- Real dynamic game feeling with endless fun.
- Beautiful 3D graphics.
- Easy driving controls.
- Bonus points for close overtakes.
- Two modes: "Traffic racing" and "Arcade racing games".
- Camera View From Driver.
- Accurate physics.

Ever wanted to try a sports cars simulator and city driving?
Now you can drive, drift and feel a luxury car for free!
Accurate physics engine that can deliver the most realistic racing fun possible.
